Toledo.National City Bank Building (Toledo): The PNC Bank Building (formerly: National City Bank Building) is a 368 ft (112 m) tall skyscraper located at 405 Madison Avenue in Downtown Toledo. The limestone-faced steel-frame building was constructed in 1930 and is an example of the Art Deco style of architecture. It stood as Toledo's tallest building for 39 years, from its completion in 1930 until the completion of the Tower on the Maumee in 1969.
